trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for most chart elements.
trans-unit.target: 表示大部分圖表項目的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Chart elements such as series, chart areas, and legends must have unique names, and reuse the unique name generation and validation logic provided by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElementCollection`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 圖表項目 (例如數列、圖表區域和圖例) 必須有唯一名稱，而且會重複使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElementCollection`1" /> 類別所提供的唯一名稱產生和驗證邏輯。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the new chart element.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement" /> class with the specified chart element name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的圖表項目名稱，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the chart element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定圖表項目的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> value that represents the name of the chart element.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="string" /> 值，表示圖表項目的名稱。
